faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about becoming a partner with Royal Transfer EU

start.question: How soon can I start after applying?
start.answer: After your application is approved, we'll guide you through onboarding which typically takes 3-7 days depending on document verification and training completion.

payment.question: How do I get paid for completed trips?
payment.answer: Payments are processed on a weekly basis. You'll receive direct deposits to your registered bank account for all completed trips, minus the platform fee.

areas.question: What areas can I provide service in?
areas.answer: You can choose your preferred service areas during registration. You can serve any areas where you're legally permitted to operate as a driver.

vehicle.question: Do I need to provide my own vehicle?
vehicle.answer: Yes, partners are required to have their own vehicles that meet our quality standards. Your vehicle must be clean, well-maintained, and less than 5 years old.

commission.question: What is the commission structure?
commission.answer: Our commission varies based on service type and location, typically ranging from 15-25%. Full details will be provided during the onboarding process.

exclusivity.question: Can I work for other transfer companies simultaneously?
exclusivity.answer: Yes, our partnership is non-exclusive. You're welcome to work with other companies or maintain your independent business alongside partnering with us.
